message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of something a bit lower. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $12,500?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a lower price, but $12,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a little more, how about $13,500? This is still a good deal for you considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $13,000?
